_header: A thing that must needs be had
_description: A riddle of the ?soul, possibly by William Wetyng — two rough couplets

CamCCC329.Transcription:
A thyng that must nedys be haddeWas take hym that hadde yt
                    natAnd he that neuer hadde ytGaf yt hym that ouȝt yt
CamCCC329.Note:
Added to page by same hand as added ‘Wetyng’, i.e., William
                    Wetyng of f. 265, possibly of Thetford, Norfolk.
